```{r}
# Load package for Dagum distribution (in VGAM package)
if(!require(VGAM)) install.packages("VGAM")
library(VGAM)

# Parameters
a <- 2   # shape parameter a
p <- 3   # shape parameter p
b_values <- c(0.5, 1, 2, 3)  # scale parameter values

# Define PDF of Dagum distribution
ddagum_custom <- function(x, a, b, p) {
  (a * p / x) * ((x / b)^(a * p)) / ((1 + (x / b)^a)^(p + 1))
}

# Save plot as PNG
png("dagum_pdf_plot.png", width = 800, height = 600)

# Plot setup
x <- seq(0.01, 10, length.out = 500)  # avoid 0 since pdf undefined at x=0
plot(x, ddagum_custom(x, a, b_values[1], p), type = "l", lwd = 2,
     ylim = c(0, 2), col = 1,
     xlab = "t", ylab = "f(t)",
     main = paste("Dagum PDF with a =", a, "and p =", p))

# Add other curves for different b values
cols <- c("blue", "red", "green", "purple")
for(i in seq_along(b_values)) {
  lines(x, ddagum_custom(x, a, b_values[i], p), col = cols[i], lwd = 2)
}

# Add grid lines
grid(nx = NULL, ny = NULL, col = "gray", lty = "dotted")

# Legend
legend("topright", legend = paste("b =", b_values),
       col = cols, lwd = 2)

dev.off()   # Close the PNG device

```


```{r}
# Parameters
a <- 2   # shape parameter a
p <- 3   # shape parameter p
b_values <- c(0.5, 1, 2, 3)  # scale parameter values from earlier example

# Survival function of Dagum distribution
sdagum_custom <- function(x, a, b, p) {
  (1 + (x / b)^a)^(-p)
}

# Save plot as PNG
png("dagum_survival_plot.png", width = 800, height = 600)

# Plot setup
x <- seq(0, 15, length.out = 500)  
plot(x, sdagum_custom(x, a, b_values[1], p), type = "l", lwd = 2,
     ylim = c(0, 1), col = 1,
     xlab = "t", ylab = "S(t)",
     main = paste("Dagum Survival Functions with a =", a, "and p =", p))

# Add other curves for different b values
cols <- c("blue", "red", "green", "purple")
for(i in seq_along(b_values)) {
  lines(x, sdagum_custom(x, a, b_values[i], p), col = cols[i], lwd = 2)
}

# Add grid lines
grid(nx = NULL, ny = NULL, col = "gray", lty = "dotted")

# Legend
legend("topright", legend = paste("b =", b_values),
       col = cols, lwd = 2)

dev.off()   # Close the PNG device

```
